Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I use the Android Paid Market from a region where it's not available yet?   I want to download the Kindle for Android app, but it is not available in my region. I tried to mock my GPS location to be inside the United States, but I still cannot find the Kindle app in the Android market.How do I download an app form the market that is restricted in my locatioon?   Also, how does the android market know where I am? Does it using the GPS location?
Title: How do I download an app from the market that is restricted in my location?

history.Text: i want to download the kindle for android app, but it is not available in my region. i tried to mock my gps location to US region, but i still cannot search out the kindle app in the android market.i am also wondering how the android market know where i am. does it using the gps location?
how to download apps that is restricted in my location?
